title: raajeevaaksha baarO
sahitya:
rAjIvAkSa bArO krSNA rAdhA ramaNa bArO krSNA 



(rAjIvAkSa)







anupallavi







mujjaga stithi vilaya mUla mukunda bArO 



(rAjIvAkSa)







caraNam 1







ahivarana paNadalli Adida dEva bArO sahisa kUDada samsAra



sAgara pOta bArO 



(rAjIvAKSa)







caraNam 2







cinnada bHuSaNa biTTa cikka svarUpa bArO beNNe caurya mADida



shrI venkaTaramaNa bArO 



(rAjIvAkSa)







caraNam 3







matsya kUrma rUpa dhara mAdhavaranga bArO kutsita ripu janara



koNDa surEsha bArO 



(rAjIvAkSa)







caraNam 4







nIrada sannibha gAtra nitya harE nI bArO vArija padAdi mereva



vArijanAbha bArO 



(rAjIvAkSa)
